existing_features.title: Update the Home page to use the uploaded image "download.webp" as a background image for the Home page hero section (the first/hero section on "/"), while preserving readability of existing hero text and buttons (add an overlay or other styling as needed).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add the provided image as the Home page background
Add the uploaded image file "download.webp" to the frontend static assets so it can be referenced by URL at runtime (e.g., place it under the public assets path) without going through the backend.

projectName: Set uploaded image as Home page background
